messages.title: A personal message from Peter FORTUNE
messages.content: It's been a difficult few years since the financial crisis hit in 2008. Jobs, homes and futures were all put in jeopardy by an irresponsible few. The fightback has been tough but we're starting to see light at the end of a very dark tunnel. That's why we must not let Ed Milliband and Ed Balls back into power, risking all that we have achieved so far. I believe that it's about time the people of Lewisham began to see the benefits of the recovering economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: For the worst performing boroughs like Lewisham
As the only real alternative in Lewisham

issues.education: Delivering improvements in education for the worst performing boroughs like Lewisham
issues.governance: Conservatives holding Labour to account as the only real alternative in Lewisham

housing.content: Peter has practical experience of working locally with the NHS and will fight to keep it safe
